SEARCH
Package org.rcmd.jneuroformats

Class FsMgh

java.lang.Object
org.rcmd.jneuroformats.FsMgh
public class FsMgh extends Object
Models a FreeSurfer volume. The volume is defined by a header (FsMghHeader) and the actual data (FsMghData). The data is stored in a 4-dimensional array.

    • MRI_UCHAR

      public static final int MRI_UCHAR
      MRI data type constants. MRI_UCHAR is a unsigned char (8 bits).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MRI_INT

      public static final int MRI_INT
      MRI data type constants. MRI_INT is a signed int (32 bits).

      • Constant Field Values

      public static final int MRI_FLOAT
      MRI data type constants. MRI_FLOAT is a float (32 bits).

      public static final int MRI_SHORT
      MRI data type constants. MRI_SHORT is a signed short (16 bits).

      Returns:
      the volume file type.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file extension is not recognized.

    • getVolumeFileFormat

      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file.
      format - the format to use if specified.
      Returns:
      the volume file type.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file extension is not recognized.

    • read

      public static FsMgh read(Path filePath) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Read a file in FreeSurfer MGH format or MGZ format and return a FsMgh object.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.mgz")`. The file format will be determined from the file extension.
      Returns:
      an FsMgh object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist.
      See Also:
      • if you want to read a file and specify the format.

    • readFormat

      public static FsMgh readFormat(Path filePath, String format) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Read a file in FreeSurfer MGH format or MGZ format and return a FsMgh object.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.mgz")`. The file format will be determined from the file extension if parameter `format` is set to `auto`.
      format - the file format to read, either "mgh", "mgz", or "auto" to auto-detect from the file name.
      Returns:
      an FsMgh object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist.
      See Also:
      • if you want to read a file without specifying the format.

    • writeFsMghToByteBuffer

      protected ByteBuffer writeFsMghToByteBuffer() throws IOException
      Write this mesh to a ByteBuffer in FreeSurfer surface format. This method is used internally by writeSurface(Path filePath).
      Returns:
      a ByteBuffer containing the MGH data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.

    • write

      public void write(Path filePath, String format) throws IOException
      Write this volume to a file in MGH format.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to write to
      format - the format to write in, must be "mgh" or "mgz".
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.
